layout.name: showInMarioChallenge
layout.title: Appear in Mario Challenge
layout.tooltip:
When checked, this level will appear in the random level roulette for the Mario Challenge. Disable this for hubs or levels that won't be possible to finish on their own.
Levels with this checked will not appear if their episode is excluded from Mario Challenge.

children.name: enable
children.title: Enable
children.tooltip: When checked, the timer will be active in this level.

children.name: time
children.title: Time
children.tooltip: The length of the timer, in seconds. When the timer hits 0, the player will be killed.

children.name: result
children.title: When Timer Ends:
children.tooltip: What occurs when the level timer ends.
